title: Diagnosing Severe Low-Gradient vs Moderate Aortic Stenosis with Artificial Intelligence Based on Echocardiography Images
details: M Wrzosek, M Buchwald, P Czernik, S Kupinski… - Journal of Imaging …, 2025
abstract: Diagnosis of aortic valve stenosis (AS) is performed manually by a physician experienced in echocardiography imaging. A specific subtype of AS, a severe low- gradient AS, is the most challenging one in terms of differentiating it from the …
